title: C++ Paint Brush
overview: This was my Computer Graphics Lab project during my undergrad studies. Here I implemented Bresenham's line drawing algorithm, filling algorithms and clipping algorithms that I learnt in the theory classes to achieve various features in the tool.

images.caption: This shows an implementation of line drawing, circle drawing and filling algorithms.
The image highlights the clipping algorithm used for displacing the bottom left portion of the image. It also implements a stretching algorithm which was used to zoom the bottom right of the image.
